Docs.summary: Defines methods and properties for writing a .

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> method in order to obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> writer for adding <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> content to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail AddThumbnail(valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType imageType) cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks For example, the `imageType` might be <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.

block.para: Only one thumbnail image can represent the document sequence as a whole (although individual documents and pages can have their own thumbnail images). An is thrown if is called when the already has a thumbnail.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.Commit%2A> method to flush and close the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> writer.
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)]

Docs.summary: Sets a for the that is being written.
Docs.value: A that represents a default printing configuration for the sequence.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Setting this property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>. If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a specified printer.
## Examples The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.PrintTicket%2A> property to associate a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.
